DOC.brief_summary: Objectives include : 1 ) establish psychometrically sound traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) screen measure use among homeless veteran ; 2 ) identify prevalence screen positive TBI among homeless veteran seek VA service ; 3 ) compare psychiatric psychosocial outcome without history TBI .
DOC.brief_title: Traumatic Brain Injury Among Homeless Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: Short-term Objectives include : 1 . Establishing criterion-related validity Traumatic Brain Injury-4 ( TBI-4 ) questionnaire Veteran homeless population use Ohio State University TBI-Identification Method ( OSU TBI-ID ) ( Corrigan et al. , 2007 ) gold standard establish traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) diagnosis . 2 . Identifying prevalence screen positive lifetime history TBI among homeless Veterans . 3 . Comparing psychiatric outcome ( psychiatric hospitalization , suicide attempt death , clinical contact ) psychosocial outcome without lifetime history TBI .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age , seek homeless service one VA Homeless Services Programs . Failure provide informed consent , old 89 year age .
